articles.author: Aniket Verma
articles.title: Is Binance founder CZ’s sentence the boost BNB needed all along? - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: A legal issue around CZ has ended. But in an ironic twist on fate, this could have been what BNB needed all along.
articles.content:
• BNB tumbled over 6% in the 24-hour period owing to broader market bloodbath.
  • The positive commentary around the coin increased dramatically in the last 2448 hours.
